original_text: And Hiram also made ten bronze buckets. Each bucket contained about 800 litres. Each bucket was 1.8 metres across. There was one bucket for each of the ten carts.
korean_text: 또 물두멍 열 개를 놋으로 만들었는데 물두멍마다 각각 사십 밧을 담게 하였으며 매 물두멍의 직경은 네 규빗이라 열 받침 수레 위에 각각 물두멍이 하나씩이더라

sentences.original_text: And Hiram also made ten bronze buckets.
sentences.korean_translation: 히람은 또한 열 개의 놋뇌를 만들었습니다.

sentences.original_text: There was one bucket for each of the ten carts.
sentences.korean_translation: 열 수레 각각에 하나의 뇌가 있었습니다.
